description: Deletes an existing opted out destination phone number from the specified opt-out list. Each destination phone number can only be deleted once every 30 days. If the specified destination phone number doesn't exist or if the opt-out list doesn't exist, an error is returned.

parameters.name: OptOutListName
parameters.description: The OptOutListName or OptOutListArn to remove the phone number from.

parameters.name: OptedOutNumber
parameters.description: The phone number, in E.164 format, to remove from the OptOutList.

nested_items.name: OptOutListArn
nested_items.description: The OptOutListArn that the phone number was removed from.

nested_items.name: OptOutListName
nested_items.description: The OptOutListName that the phone number was removed from.

nested_items.name: OptedOutNumber
nested_items.description: The phone number that was removed from the OptOutList.

nested_items.name: OptedOutTimestamp
nested_items.description: The time that the number was removed at, in UNIX epoch time format.

nested_items.name: EndUserOptedOut
nested_items.description: This is true if it was the end user who requested their phone number be removed.
